page.title: 08LOCAL GHOSTS
page.content: {GOLDSTONE GHOUL { }Years ago there was a young man who was disformed and very ugly. It is said that the vicar had him chained up and sealed in a hollow tree. He was left to die.People say that they hear his screams when they pass by the hollow tree. {THE GHOST OF MR. BREEZE} On the Yelves housing estate there is a man who is said to walk through walls. He plays the violin on his travels....! { THE CARRIAGE GHOST { }On the old main road to Newport, on certain nights, can be seen the ghost of an old-fashioned carriage rattling along. We cannot find an explanation for this.
